The entities "Re", "Rg1", and "Rb1" are the only ones that can be considered chemical entities with a reasonable level of certainty. The term "withdrawal" could potentially be considered a chemical term in some contexts, but in this paragraph, it is being used to refer to a process rather than a chemical substance.
